name: Iron Man
description: Increases your wrestler’s maximum stamina by 2.

name: Unbreakable
description: Increases your wrestler’s maximum health by 2.

name: Lethal Strike
description: All Strike attack cards deal +1 extra damage.

name: Lethal Grapple
description: All Grapple attack cards deal +1 extra damage.

name: Lethal Throw
description: All Throw attack cards deal +1 extra damage.

name: Lethal Aerial
description: All Aerial attack cards deal +1 extra damage.

name: Rope-a-dope
description: Gain both 1 stamina and 1 card every time you suffer a successful attack.
